review: I really love the Chromecast but the apps on my iPhone (Netflix mainly) disconnect from the Chromecast. I don't know if that's due to the Chromecast but it's annoying to have to close the app, then re-open it to re-connect to the Chromecast and stop the next episode from playing (or pause for a break). Other than that it's small, convenient, hides behind the TV, and displays a great picture! When the app issue is resolved I'll change it to 5 stars.
